description: Architectural and Engineering firms with the knowledge and experience with Office to Residential Conversion Assessments to submit proposals for Standing Offers.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Notice Notification**
=====================================

### Tender Details

#### Title
EP168-250039 – Request for Standing Offer - Office to Residential Conversion Assessments

#### Reference Number
WS4627937458-Doc4635674175

#### Tender Status
The tender is expired as per the amendment dated **July 24, 2024**

### Key Dates

*   **Publication Date**: June 14, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: August 6, 2024, 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 1, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: September 30, 2027

### Procurement Details

*   **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
*   **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Trading Agreements
This tender is subject to various international agreements including:

*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**, located at **11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada**.

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact [Steve Bourassa](mailto:steve.bourassa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or visit our website at the provided notice URL.

The government of Canada is interested in hiring **Architectural and Engineering** firms to provide services for Office to Residential Conversion Assessments across Canada. The selected consultants will be responsible for
